rulings.text: Kiln Fiend's triggered ability resolves before the spell that causes it to trigger. The ability will resolve even if that spell is countered or otherwise leaves the stack.

mainBoard.name: Thermo-Alchemist
mainBoard.originalText:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.

rulings.text: In a Two-Headed Giant game, Thermo-Alchemist’s activated ability deals 1 damage to each of your opponents, resulting in the opposing team losing 2 life.

Thermo-Alchemist’s triggered ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered. Players can cast spells and activate abilities (such as Thermo-Alchemist’s own activated ability) after the triggered ability resolves but before the spell that caused it to trigger does.

mainBoard.name: Chandra's Pyreling
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, Chandra's Pyreling gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

rulings.text: Combat damage is the damage that's dealt automatically by attacking and blocking creatures. Any other damage is noncombat damage, even if it's dealt during a combat phase by an attacking or blocking creature.

The ability of Chandra's Pyreling triggers just once per event for each opponent who is dealt noncombat damage by a source you control, regardless of how much damage that player is dealt. For example, if a sorcery you control deals 2 damage to each opponent in a four-player game, the ability will trigger three times.

mainBoard.text: Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to an opponent, this creature gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

foreignData.name: Kinetische Augurin
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden (Diese Kreatur kann überschüssigen Kampfschaden dem verteidigenden Spieler oder Planeswalker zufügen.)
Die Stärke der Kinetischen Augurin ist gleich der Anzahl an Spontanzauber- und Hexereikarten in deinem Friedhof.
Wenn die Kinetische Augurin ins Spiel kommt, wirf bis zu zwei Karten ab und ziehe dann entsprechend viele Karten.

foreignData.name: Augur cinética
foreignData.text:
Arrolla. (Esta criatura puede hacer el daño de combate sobrante al jugador o planeswalker al que ataca.)

Cuando la Augur cinética entre al campo de batalla, descarta hasta dos cartas, luego roba esa misma cantidad de cartas.

foreignData.name: Augure cinétique

Quand l'Augure cinétique arrive sur le champ de bataille, défaussez-vous de jusqu'à deux cartes, puis piochez autant de cartes.

foreignData.name: Augure Cinetica
foreignData.text:

foreignData.name: 動態の占い師
foreignData.text:
トランプル（このクリーチャーは余剰の戦闘ダメージを、これが攻撃しているプレイヤーかプレインズウォーカーに与えることができる。）

動態の占い師が戦場に出たとき、カード最大２枚を捨て、その後その枚数に等しい枚数のカードを引く。

Quando Áugure Cinética entrar no campo de batalha, descarte até dois cards e depois compre aquela quantidade de cards.

foreignData.name: Предсказательница Движения
foreignData.text:

mainBoard.name: Kinetic Augur
mainBoard.originalText:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Kinetic Augur's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
When Kinetic Augur enters the battlefield, discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.

rulings.text: As Kinetic Augur's triggered ability resolves, you choose whether to discard zero, one, or two cards, discard them, and draw that many. You can't discard one card, draw a card, then choose to discard again.
The ability that defines Kinetic Augur's power works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Heartfire Immolator
mainBoard.originalText:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{R}, Sacrifice Heartfire Immolator: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.

rulings.text: Players can't take any actions between the time you begin to activate Heartfire Immolator's last ability and the time it's sacrificed. Notably, opponents can't try to lower its power.
Use Heartfire Immolator's power as it last existed on the battlefield to determine how much damage its last ability deals.

mainBoard.text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{R}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.

mainBoard.flavorText: First the insult, then the encore.
mainBoard.name: Doublecast
mainBoard.originalText: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

rulings.text: A copy is created even if the spell that caused Doublecast’s ability to trigger has been countered by the time that ability resolves. The copy resolves before the original spell.
Doublecast’s ability will copy any instant or sorcery spell, not just one with targets.
If the spell that’s copied has an X whose value was determined as it was cast, the copy has the same value of X.
If the spell that’s copied is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copy will have the same mode or modes. You can’t choose different ones.

If you cast one Doublecast after another, you’ll copy the second Doublecast. Each resolves, creating two delayed triggered abilities. The next spell you cast after that will be copied twice. If that spell is also a Doublecast, the following spell will be copied three times, and so on.
The copy that Doublecast’s ability creates is created on the stack, so it’s not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won’t trigger.

The copy will have the same targets as the spell it’s copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. The new targets must be legal.

You can’t choose to pay any additional costs for the copy. However, effects based on any additional costs that were paid for the original spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy too.

mainBoard.text: When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

mainBoard.name: Immolating Gyre
mainBoard.originalText: Immolating Gyre deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Because Immolating Gyre is still on the stack while it’s resolving, it doesn’t count towards the value of X.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Immolating Gyre deals damage to your teammate’s creatures and planeswalkers.

mainBoard.text: Immolating Gyre deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker you don't control, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

foreignData.text:
由你操控的生物获得践踏异能直到回合结束。（具践踏异能的生物造成之过量战斗伤害能对所攻击的牌手或鹏洛客造成之。）
抓一张牌。

foreignData.name: 全力突破
foreignData.text:
由你操控的生物獲得踐踏異能直到回合結束。（具踐踏異能的生物造成之過量戰鬥傷害能對所攻擊的玩家或鵬洛客造成之。）
抽一張牌。

mainBoard.name: Crash Through
mainBoard.originalText:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (A creature with trample can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Crash Through affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. Creatures you begin to control later in the turn won't gain trample.
You may cast Crash Through even if you control no creatures. If you control no creatures as the spell resolves, you'll just draw a card.
Crash Through affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. Creatures you begin to control later in the turn won't gain trample.
You may cast Crash Through even if you control no creatures. If you control no creatures as the spell resolves, you'll just draw a card.

mainBoard.text:
Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. (Each of those creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: In the hold of the *Heart of Kiran*, Chandra answered Dovin Baan's sabotage with an explosive retort.
mainBoard.name: Hungry Flames
mainBoard.originalText: Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

rulings.text: You can’t cast Hungry Flames unless you target both a creature and a player. If one target is illegal as Hungry Flames resolves, the spell deals damage to the remaining legal target.

mainBoard.text: Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The beauty of it is they never see it coming. Ever."
—Razzix, sparkmage

foreignData.flavorText:
„Das Schöne daran ist, dass sie ihn nie kommen sehen. Niemals."
—Razzix, Funkenmagier
foreignData.name: Schock
foreignData.text: Der Schock fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Lo hermoso que tiene es que nunca lo ven venir. Nunca".
—Rázzix, magochispa
foreignData.name: Choque
foreignData.text: El Choque hace 2 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Le plus beau, c'est qu'ils ne le voient jamais venir. Jamais. »
—Razzix, étincemage
foreignData.name: Choc
foreignData.text: Le Choc inflige 2 blessures à n'importe quelle cible.

foreignData.flavorText:
"La cosa bella è che non se lo aspettano. Mai."
—Razzix, magoscintilla
foreignData.name: Shock
foreignData.text: Lo Shock infligge 2 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText:
「その美しさは、それが飛んでくるのが見えないってことだな。絶対に。」
――火花魔道士、ラジックス
foreignData.name: ショック
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。ショックはそれに２点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText:
"이 주문의 장점은 아무도 이걸 예상하지 못한다는 거야. 절대로."
—번개마도사, 라직스
foreignData.name: 충격
foreignData.text: 원하는 목표를 정한다. 충격은 그 목표에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"O melhor de tudo é que eles são sempre pegos desprevenidos. Sempre."
— Razzix, mago de centelhas
foreignData.name: Choque
foreignData.text: Choque causa 2 pontos de dano a qualquer alvo.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Вся прелесть в том, что его не ждут. Никогда».
— Раззикс, электромаг
foreignData.name: Шок
foreignData.text: Шок наносит 2 повреждения любой цели.

foreignData.flavorText:
「最令人激赏的一点，是他们完全浑然不知。完完全全。」
～火花法师剌极
foreignData.name: 电震
foreignData.text: 电震对任意一个目标造成2点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText:
「最令人激賞的一點，是他們完全渾然不知。完完全全。」
～火花法師剌極
foreignData.name: 電震
foreignData.text: 電震對任意一個目標造成2點傷害。

mainBoard.name: Shock
mainBoard.originalText: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
mainBoard.text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Right now, in these first moments of creation, it is simultaneously nothing and everything."

foreignData.flavorText: „Gerade jetzt, in diesen ersten Augenblicken der Schöpfung, ist es nichts und alles zugleich."
foreignData.name: Verlockung der Möglichkeiten
foreignData.text:
Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, eine Karte ab.
Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ahora mismo, en estos primeros instantes de creación, es a la vez todo y nada".
foreignData.name: Entusiasmo ante la posibilidad
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, descarta una carta.
Roba dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Là, en ces premiers instants de création, c'est à la fois tout et rien. »
foreignData.name: Frisson de probabilité
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
Piochez deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ora, in questi primi momenti di creazione, è al contempo tutto e niente."
foreignData.name: Brivido della Possibilità
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, scarta una carta.
Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 「たった今、この創造の最初の瞬間は、無であると同時に全でもある。」
foreignData.name: 胸躍る可能性
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、カード１枚を捨てる。
カードを２枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "바로 지금, 이 창조의 첫 순간에, 그것은 아무것도 아닌 동시에 모든 것이다."
foreignData.name: 가능성의 스릴
foreignData.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 카드 한 장을 버린다.
카드 두 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Agora, nestes primeiros momentos de criação, isto é simultaneamente nada e tudo."
foreignData.name: Frisson das Possibilidades
foreignData.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, descarte um card.
Compre dois cards.

foreignData.flavorText: «Прямо сейчас, в эти первые моменты творения, это одновременно и все, и ничего».
foreignData.name: Азарт Возможностей
foreignData.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания сбросьте карту.
Возьмите две карты.

foreignData.flavorText: 「眼下，在这创造的最初时刻，灿烂成果或破烂废铁就在一念之间。」
foreignData.name: 快意拼搏
foreignData.text:
弃一张牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
抓两张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 「眼下，在這創造的最初時刻，燦爛成果或破爛廢鐵就在一念之間。」
foreignData.name: 快意拚搏
foreignData.text:
棄一張牌，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
抽兩張牌。

mainBoard.name: Thrill of Possibility
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

rulings.text: You must discard exactly one card to cast Thrill of Possibility; you can't cast it without discarding a card, and you can't discard additional cards.

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.
mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
